Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Confidentiality Level: A+, Urgency: S, Hazard Index: A+, Authentication: Gray Raven. Mission details uploaded. Implementing the permission request...'}
{2: 'What is it?', 3: '7', 4: 'You seem quite serious...', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, a new request for combat has come in from Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It\'s different from our typical missions this time... Commandant, do you know anything about the "Memory Chip"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'As you know, the Memory Chip is the culmination of extraordinary tactical memory data of human ancestors.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'As the commandant, you can equip and combine various Memory Chips for the Construct through the tactical support program to design a tactical plan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In this way, the Construct can make use of different tactical memory data to better deal with the changes during battles.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Your answer makes me wonder if we've been in a state of vacancy in the six memory slots.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Well, I doubt it.', 3: '18', 4: 'Correct.', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '... Am I supposed to feel relieved now? All in all, the Memory Chip is the culmination of the extraordinary tactical memory data of our human ancestors.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's something to think about whether it's the amazing luck or the inconspicuous leadership of the commandant that has gotten the Gray Raven this far.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'As the commandant, you can equip and combine various Memory Chips for the Construct through the tactical support program to design a tactical plan.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'In this way, the Construct can make use of different tactical memory data to better deal with the changes during battles.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Memory Chip tech has always been a significant and effective approach to enhance the overall battle power of Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But now, it was intercepted by the Ascendants.', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '28'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The tactical terminal of Babylonia was recently infected by the Punishing Virus and it tore a tiny gap.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The gap is extremely small. Records show that a central system has found and fixed this tiny gap in 0.03 seconds. But the gap... happens to be where the memory data is stored.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This was a well-planned and targeted attack, most likely initiated by the Ascendants.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Though we've isolated the memory data that was briefly exposed, only 27.7% of the memory data is guaranteed to be uncorrupted after a thorough check.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Things are not promising.', 3: '37', 4: 'What should we do?', 5: '40'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Fortunately, Memory Chip tech is a core tech that has been put into research since the end of the Post-Pandemic Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'All original data of uncorrupted memory should still be preserved in the ground tactical initially deployed on Earth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "There's still hope. Don't panic.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, Commandant. But according to the analysis of the early related records, Babylonia has acquired an important message.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'At the end of the Post-Pandemic Age, humans once deployed a ground tactical terminal on Earth, where it was highly likely to preserve all uncorrupted original memory data.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's right.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Are you sure it was not corrupted?', 3: '47', 4: 'Do the ascendants have any idea about this?', 5: '48'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm not a hundred percent sure. After all, the records were too far back and a lot of information was lacking, but it's worth looking into.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm not a hundred percent sure. But even if it's a risky move, it's also the only effective way to recycle the original uncorrupted memory data in the ground tactical terminal.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Prepare for battle.', 3: '50', 4: 'Liv?', 5: '52'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Combat mission confirmed: Detect the original memory data in the ground tactical terminal and recycle the uncorrupted data to restore functionality.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, have you located where the ground tactical terminal is?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, I've detected ten ground tactical terminals through data analysis and calculations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The positioning satellite detected that there was a strong reaction of the Corrupted everywhere, but no signs of the Ascendants...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'We have to recycle all memory data before they discover the ground tactical terminals.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The information and corruption analysis report of the ten Memory Chips have already been loaded into my database.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Prepare to move out.', 3: '63', 4: 'A fight is waiting for us.', 5: '63'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Right. The first goal, memory: Cottie. Gray Raven, get ready for the battle.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I have a bad feeling... about the original memory data.', 4: '3'}
